bow: hey breast feeding fanatics stop shaming moms who use formula thank you due to certain severe stress surrounding my life around the time my son was born the ol milkers did want to work it was either formula or starve he had absolutely no breastmilk and is happy extremely healthy little dude edit midwife fanatics tried to make them work was too in to that fanatics let us calm our tits please enough with the mommy wars crap enough it can be tricky though when every single utterance is greeted with defensiveness if say credit breastfeeding for the closeness had with my kids someone who did breastfeed will hear you formula feeders must hate your children when what was saying was actually just what was saying it can be hard line to navigate one thing that think is good to remember is really paying attention to whether people want advice or not mother ranting that her milk supply is too low and she needs to supplement may not actually be looking for advice she may just be venting so if you respond by saying try this did you do this are you doing xy and it can come across as form of judgement with the message you did try hard enough even when well intended think in the mommy wars no matter what the subject is lot of the shaming and offense not all of it but lot of it is really in our *perceptions* of what other people are saying breastfeed but do credit my closeness with my baby to it credit the closeness with my baby to the time we spend cuddling which could be if were bottle feeding her credit the time spend playing the youtube clip of let it go over and over in the corner of my computer screen while she sits in my lap and do my internet things credit the time spend singing in silly voices to make her laugh credit the after bath moments while brush her hair and read her story it not really one action or thing that think made us close just all the times do stuff with her it could be other stuff that we do we could do anything and it would matter because we re doing it together think this might actually be the most appropriate use of calm your tits have ever seen lol indeed big fan of breastfeeding was always so grateful that was able to nurse my babies and it is the ideal food for infants but that does mean that moms who use formula are less are doing something bad for their babies are poisoning their kids and causing long term damage or have given up are vain whatever other ugly stupid ass thing that breastfeeding fanatics claim it makes me want to puke to see the way some women treat other moms especially over things that are none of their damn business in the first place it is nobody business if mom needs to use formula or *wants* to because she does not want to breastfeed that is her choice to make and it such stupid thing to judge another mom for sincerely believe that everyone needs to mind their own business when it comes to personal choies such as this it just that so many of us have dealt with so much crap that impossible to take with grain of salt so we talk it out dont see it as mommy war see it as breach of boundary that needs to be realized and respected also some folks need to think before they speak thats the part that drives me crazy you have someone who says they are having supply issues and any good intentioned advice is taken as shaming if someone is giving advice and you do want their advice you can say no thank you or ignore them or myriad of other things without complaining that they were making you feel bad maybe its just because only read reddit parenting areas and do get involved in other parenting forums but have seen any shaming see people complaining about breastfeeding nazis but do see them see bfs who will give advice give support and see them respecting others decisions and then see post after post of bitching and crying that those bfs are so mean and judgemental right sick of the whole thing if you want to formula feed great not my baby not my body and could not care less but do try to make me feel like bitch because do formula feed and do get all crazy if try to help someone who is trying to breastfeed rather than telling them to give up if you think its all the same that fine but that does mean that we all have to feel that way tldr rantyrantrantrant could breastfeed and feel the same way when bottle feed still hold my son close cuddle and talk to him and look into his eyes hahaha had lactation consultant try to make mine work too had bruises on my boobs for days from her pushing and squeezing yep my son got formula after weeks of stress crying depression and screaming baby think the media needs to stop shaming all moms if we breastfeed we are fanatics if we formula feed are we mom enough it all bullshit ve never once looked at mom feeding her baby and thought ugh ca believe she is ff bf we need to stop reading this bullshit and thinking every mom around us is judging us because honestly do know about you but too busy trying to raise my kids not to be sociopaths to worry about whether it is breast or formula that my neighbors baby is getting using throwaway because about to be very unpopular the truth is this is bullshit formula feeders are not some poor persecuted minority less than 15 of moms in the us breastfeed past months less than 15 and that breastfeeding at all not even exclusively the number of moms ebfing past months is even lower breastfeeding moms do shame formula feeders breastfeeders are the ones who are shamed for showing our tits in public for letting our kids have an unnatural aka nonsexual relationship with our breasts for not weaning early enough we have to have laws passed to protect our right to feed our kids and despite those laws we all still take tons of shit what think happens is that moms who use formula have internalized guilt about not breastfeeding they know that breast is best but for whatever reason biology or choice they do breastfeed as result of their guilt over the issue every time someone *mentions* breastfeeding they take it as personal goddamned affront like how dare you mention the fact that you breastfeed when all you re really doing is condemning the way feed my kid breastfeeders are not condemning the way you feed your kid we re talking about the way we feed ours will tell you in the months ve been ebfing my kid have never once said anything negative throwaway seriously thanks appreciate the gold right on this mommy war is so unessicary deleted deleted think the key in life in general not just this issue is to offer advice if someone asks for it if you have suggestion you think would help and they have asked for input try asking do you want suggestions because ve been through it but also totally get if you just want to vent fun fact from my start as mom was shamed for not using formula ve been treated worse for breastfeeding screamed at by family members at how disgusting was shamed into leaving family friend gatherings did leave my judging you are offering up your experience and knowledge and you are hoping you can help your friend with their issue why should this be any different am aware that ffers get shit sure but think the ff persecution complex is unhinged from reality ffers are the majority the vast vast majority in fact there no real persecution going on here get that sometimes people are assholes to you about your choice to ff but ai no one ever told you to go feed your baby in an alley http consumerist com 2014 01 24 victorias secret apologizes after store tells mom to breastfeed in alley so seriously the poor shamed ffers can take their martyr complex and shove it dead horse lets beat it some more ugh think everyone needs to stop yelling and screaming at people for breastfeeding or not breastfeeding because everyone has their reason to do what they do and it their choice not yours and you have no right to make them feel bad about their own convictions if you want to tell someone they are wrong for whatever way they feed their child then by all means go and pay for that kids hospital bills food rent bills etc because other wise stfu and leave am so tired of people shoving advice in everyone face it sets people like me up for expectations that get let down and as result it made me feel like was not good mom because could feed my son the more healthy way sat depressed and miserable for months because had to give up doing what wanted for my own health and may not be as strong as some of you but had to make the choice that was failure as mother and move on from that depression shame on anyone who makes any mom feel like shit for their own choices on how to raise their kids it none of your business stop giving out advice period the end seriously work friend of mine just came back she got awkward and told me she ffs said something like well basically dairy cow so if nothing else works and you want to borrow some milk to give it try just let me know she told me that was disgusting and that needed to stop shaming her for not bfing now she wo talk to me and avoids me like the plague around the office but you know clearly deserved it since such goddamned bully wish could upvote this more than once yep was told my kid was too skinny and my milk must be skim was told he was getting enough was told to pump all day long to make sure there were enough ounces as if
